column4: can anyone tell me where to get or how to enable .wmv codecs for mplayer or xine??

I have a very silly question.. but I am a NooB, so excuse my ignorance... I am sitting at an XP machine connected to my Ubuntu machine at home via ssh, I have a file(tar.gz) on the Xp machine that I want to Xfer to my Ubuntu machine... how do I do that.. i looked into scp, but that looks like it would work the other way
